data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Northeast Greenland National Park, Greenland to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Northeast Greenland National Park, Greenland
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Northeast Greenland National Park to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Northeast Greenland National Park, Greenland that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 87 believers in Northeast Greenland National Park, Greenland to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Northeast Greenland National Park, Greenland to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Northeast Greenland National Park, Greenland. Please, stir the 87 believers here to pray for awakening.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Northeast Greenland National Park, Greenland so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.
